          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Negative and positive charges produced from rubbing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Negativ- und Positivladungen produzierten aus 
Rubbing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les frais de négatif et de positif ont produit 
à partir du frottage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As cargas do negativo e do positivo produziram do
rubbing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le spese del positive e della negazione hanno 
prodotto dal rubbing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρνητικές και θετικές δαπάνες που παράγονται από το 
τρίψιμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cargas de la negativa y del positivo producidas 
del frotamiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the acetate strip becomes positively charged while the cloth becomes negatively charged when rubbed together.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cloth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubbing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Azetatstreifen 
positiv aufgeladen wird, während das Tuch negativ aufgeladen wird, 
wenn es zusammen gelöscht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la bande d'acétate
devient franchement chargée tandis que le tissu devient négativement
chargé une fois frotté ensemble.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a tira do acetato se
torna carregada positivamente quando o pano se tornar carregado 
negativamente quando friccionado junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la striscia 
dell'acetato è caricata positivamente mentre il panno è caricato 
negativamente una volta lucidato insieme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η λουρίδα οξικού 
άλατος γίνεται θετικά χρεωμένη ενώ το ύφασμα γίνεται αρνητικά 
χρεωμένο όταν τριμμένος από κοινού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la tira del acetato
se carga positivamente mientras que el paño se carga negativamente 
cuando está frotado junto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
